flawed_nl_solution:
Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=8>>8 cows.
This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 8 cows + 24 cows = <<8+24=23>>23 cows.
After he bought more cows he now has 23 cows + 43 cows = <<23+43=66>>66 cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has 66 cows + 8 cows = <<66+8=74>>74 cows.
#### 74

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
